name: Apple MacBook Air M2
description: A thin and lightweight laptop, ideal for students and professionals who require excellent performance and long battery life. Equipped with the powerful M2 chip.
specification_1: Powered by the 8-core Apple M2 chip, granting fast video editing and multitasking capabilities in a silent, fanless design.
specification_2: A stunning 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display with high clarity and vibrant colors, housed in a thin aluminum chassis.
specification_3: Offers up to 18 hours of video playback, making it the perfect portable companion for work or study on the go.
specification_4: Runs on MacOS, providing seamless integration with other Apple devices and a high-quality 1080p FaceTime HD camera.

name: Dell XPS 13 (2024)
description: A luxurious ultrabook with a stunning InfinityEdge display. An excellent choice for users seeking elegance and performance in a small package.
specification_1: A mesmerizing near-borderless 4K display offering vibrant colors and high brightness, ideal for creative content and media consumption.
specification_2: Powered by the latest Intel Core Ultra 7 processor, delivering blazing-fast responsiveness and high power efficiency with integrated AI capabilities.
specification_3: Crafted from CNC machined aluminum and carbon fiber, ensuring superior durability and a premium feel, with a comfortable keyboard experience.
specification_4: Features versatile Thunderbolt 4 ports, enabling super-fast data transfer, quick charging, and connection to multiple 8K external displays.

name: HP Spectre x360 Convertible
description: A 2-in-1 convertible laptop with a 360-degree rotating touchscreen. Perfect for creativity and content consumption.
specification_1: 360-degree convertible design, allowing for use in laptop mode, tent mode for viewing, or tablet mode using the touchscreen display.
specification_2: 4K OLED touchscreen providing perfect contrasts and true, deep blacks, ideal for designers and photo editors.
specification_3: Includes a digital camera kill switch and fingerprint reader to ensure privacy and data confidentiality for personal and professional use.
specification_4: Powered by a 13th Gen Intel Core i7 processor and 16GB of RAM, ensuring smooth operation when switching between heavy applications.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12
description: The king of business laptops. Known for its durability, comfortable keyboard, and advanced security features. Ideal for intensive work.
specification_1: Tested against 12 military-grade requirements, ensuring resistance to shocks, heat, and vibration in demanding work environments.
specification_2: Features the renowned ThinkPad keyboard with optimal key travel, providing unmatched comfort for long typing sessions.
specification_3: Includes a TPM 2.0 encryption chip and ThinkShutter camera protection, offering top-tier security for sensitive business data.
specification_4: Despite its durability, it's extremely thin and lightweight, making it easy to carry for business meetings and constant travel.

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop Studio 2
description: An innovative high-performance computer with a screen that adjusts into three different positions (Laptop, Stage, Studio). Targeting designers and creators.
specification_1: The display can transform into Studio Mode, making it a perfect platform for drawing and writing with the Surface Slim Pen.
specification_2: Equipped with an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4000 card, giving it massive power for running 3D graphics software and 8K video editing.
specification_3: A 120Hz PixelSense Flow display, offering exceptional color accuracy and ultra-smoothness, essential for designers and color professionals.
specification_4: Provides the best integrated Windows experience, with advanced support for touch and Microsoft-specific operating system features.

name: Custom Gaming Desktop PC
description: A custom-built desktop unit with an i7 Core processor and an RTX 4070 graphics card. Massive power for running the latest games and 3D design software.
specification_1: Features an advanced Intel Core i7 processor and an NVIDIA RTX 4070 graphics card, ensuring high frame rates and smooth running of modern games at 4K resolution.
specification_2: Equipped with 32GB of DDR5 memory and a 1TB NVMe SSD, minimizing loading times for games and applications.
specification_3: Includes a custom Liquid Cooling system to ensure temperatures stay low during marathon gaming sessions and maintain maximum performance.
specification_4: Chassis design allows easy access to all components, ensuring easy future upgrades of the graphics card or memory.

name: Acer Aspire 5
description: A budget-friendly computer suitable for daily tasks such as web browsing, email, and video streaming. Good performance for the price.
specification_1: Offers reliable performance thanks to the 13th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, the optimal choice for limited budgets for daily use and remote education.
spec_title_2: Large Screen for Work and Entertainment
specification_2: 15.6-inch Full HD display, providing enough space for working on multiple documents and watching movies in good quality.
specification_3: Equipped with a full range of ports, including USB-C and HDMI, for easy connection to all peripherals, printers, and monitors.
specification_4: Features a practical and relatively lightweight design, making it easy to carry between home and office without hassle, with a thin screen bezel.

name: Apple iMac M1 (24-inch)
description: An All-in-One desktop machine with a stunning 4.5K screen and a thin, colorful design. Perfect for home and office with an elegant aesthetic.
specification_1: A 24-inch 4.5K Retina display offering over a billion colors, making it ideal for tasks requiring high precision like graphic design and video editing.
specification_2: Powered by the M1 chip, providing instant responsiveness and powerful performance with high energy efficiency, perfect for office and creative use.
specification_3: Ultra-thin All-in-One design in vibrant colors, adding an aesthetic touch to any desk or room while minimizing cable clutter.
specification_4: Comes with a 1080p FaceTime HD camera and three studio-quality microphones, making it ideal for professional video calls and meetings.

name: HP ZBook Firefly 14 G8
description: A specialized mobile workstation for creators and engineers. Intel i7-1185G7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD. Excellent for small spaces and basic office work, saving costs.
specification_1: A specialized laptop for professional work, designed to run engineering and design applications (CAD) efficiently thanks to the i7-1185G7 processor.
specification_2: Features high durability and resilience to intensive use, making it a reliable choice for engineers who travel between sites.
specification_3: Standard DreamColor display offering excellent color accuracy, ensuring precise rendering for engineering projects and graphic design.
specification_4: Includes advanced HP security features like HP Sure View to protect the screen from onlookers in public spaces.

name: Apple MacBook Air M2
description: A thin and lightweight laptop, ideal for students and professionals who require excellent performance and long battery life. Equipped with the powerful M2 chip.
specification_1: Powered by the 8-core Apple M2 chip, granting fast video editing and multitasking capabilities in a silent, fanless design.
specification_2: A stunning 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display with high clarity and vibrant colors, housed in a thin aluminum chassis.

specification_4: Runs on MacOS, providing seamless integration with other Apple devices and a high-quality 1080p FaceTime HD camera.

specification_1: A 24-inch 4.5K Retina display offering over a billion colors, making it ideal for tasks requiring high precision like graphic design and video editing.

name: HP ZBook Firefly 14 G8
description: A specialized mobile workstation for creators and engineers. Intel i7-1185G7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD. Excellent for small spaces and basic office work, saving costs.
specification_1: A specialized laptop for professional work, designed to run engineering and design applications (CAD) efficiently thanks to the i7-1185G7 processor.
specification_2: Features high durability and resilience to intensive use, making it a reliable choice for engineers who travel between sites.
specification_3: Standard DreamColor display offering excellent color accuracy, ensuring precise rendering for engineering projects and graphic design.
specification_4: Includes advanced HP security features like HP Sure View to protect the screen from onlookers in public spaces.

name: HP Spectre x360 14
description: A premium 2-in-1 convertible laptop featuring a stunning OLED display and a sleek, aluminum design.
specification_1: OLED touchscreen display with a 3:2 aspect ratio, offering vibrant colors and deep blacks, ideal for visual content and productivity.
specification_2: Ultra-thin design crafted from machined aluminum, easily convertible from a laptop to a tablet thanks to the 360-degree hinge.
specification_3: A quad-speaker audio system by Bang & Olufsen providing a rich and immersive sound experience, perfect for movies and music.
specification_4: Equipped with the latest Intel Core i7 processor, providing excellent performance for daily tasks and light photo/video editing.

name: HP EliteBook 840 G7
description: A thin and light professional business notebook offering robust security and reliable performance for professionals.
specification_1: Designed for professionals on the move, featuring a slim aluminum chassis weighing less than 1.4 kg, making it easy to carry.
specification_2: Powered by a 10th Gen Intel Core i5 processor and 16GB RAM, providing stable performance for business applications and complex spreadsheets.
specification_3: Includes advanced HP security features like HP Sure Start and HP Sure Click, protecting the device from malware and BIOS attacks.
specification_4: Long battery life with HP Fast Charge technology, allowing 50% battery charging in about 30 minutes.

name: HP Pavilion Aero 13
description: An extremely lightweight laptop (under 1kg) with a gorgeous 16:10 display, perfect for portability and travel.
specification_1: Weighing less than 1 kg, making it one of the lightest laptops on the market, ideal for students and travelers seeking ultimate comfort.
specification_2: WUXGA display with a 16:10 aspect ratio, providing 10% more vertical viewing space, perfect for web browsing and document work.
specification_3: Powered by an AMD Ryzen 5 5600U processor, offering an excellent balance between performance and battery life in a slim chassis.
specification_4: Constructed from a magnesium-aluminum alloy, providing high durability and a premium feel while maintaining the required lightness.

name: HP Omen 16
description: A powerful gaming laptop featuring an advanced graphics card and a fast, high refresh rate display.
specification_1: Features an NVIDIA RTX 4060 graphics card and an Intel Core i9 processor, ensuring high frame rates and smooth running of modern games.
specification_2: QHD display with a 165Hz refresh rate, perfect for competitive gamers who need the fastest response and clear details during gameplay.
specification_3: Innovative Tempest Cooling system from Omen, using optimized fans and blades to keep components cool under maximum load.
specification_4: Customizable RGB keyboard (4 zones) with responsive keys to enhance the control experience during gaming.

name: HP ENVY 17
description: A large-screen 17.3-inch laptop, ideal for creators and intensive multi-tasking and media consumption.
specification_1: 17.3-inch 4K display, ideal for creators needing a large workspace and media enthusiasts preferring the highest viewing quality.
specification_2: Powered by a 12th Gen Intel Core i7 processor and 32GB RAM, offering immense processing power for managing video projects and CAD simultaneously.
specification_3: 5MP webcam with lighting adjustment and facial recognition, ensuring high quality for video calls and recordings.
specification_4: Features a design crafted from aluminum, with fine and precise details to enhance the professional and elegant look.

name: HP ProBook 450 G8
description: A durable and reliable business laptop designed for daily office use and small business environments.
specification_1: Durable chassis resistant to minor wear and tear from daily use, suitable for office environments requiring a dependable device.
specification_2: Features an 8th Gen Intel Core i5 processor, more than sufficient for running Office applications, email, and smooth internet browsing.
specification_3: Includes a fingerprint reader and TPM 2.0 chip, providing a basic level of data protection necessary for small businesses.
specification_4: Allows for relatively easy upgrade of RAM and storage drive, extending the device's lifespan and improving its efficiency in the future.

name: HP Victus 15
description: A budget-friendly gaming laptop that delivers solid performance for modern games and entertainment.
specification_1: Offers good gaming performance thanks to the NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 card, the optimal choice for entry-level modern gamers on a moderate budget.
specification_2: 15.6-inch display with a 144Hz refresh rate, ensuring smooth motion in competitive and sports games, giving a competitive edge.
specification_3: Features a clean and elegant design (instead of the usual aggressive gaming style), making it suitable for daily use as well.
specification_4: Includes a dual-fan cooling system that efficiently dissipates heat, maintaining stable performance during long gaming sessions.

name: HP ZBook Firefly 15 G8
description: A slim and light Mobile Workstation, certified for professional design and engineering applications.
specification_1: Combines the power of a Workstation with the lightness of an Ultrabook, ideal for engineers and designers needing power on the go.
specification_2: Certified to efficiently run engineering design software (like Autodesk and SolidWorks), ensuring the highest reliability in professional work environments.
specification_3: Battery designed to last a full workday, with advanced HP power management features to maximize productivity.
specification_4: Includes a dedicated graphics card (like Quadro T500), ensuring stable and accurate performance in rendering 3D models.

name: HP 15-dw3000
description: A basic laptop for everyday tasks, browsing, and remote learning, offered at an economical price.
specification_1: The best choice for low budgets, providing all the essentials for browsing, email, and school or university tasks.
specification_2: 15.6-inch screen with an anti-glare coating, reducing eye strain during long use in various lighting conditions.
specification_3: Features a comfortable traditional design, with a full keyboard and comfortable palm rest area for typing.
specification_4: Supports relatively easy storage upgrade, giving users the option to improve device speed in the future at a low cost.

name: HP Chromebook x360 14c
description: A convertible Chrome OS laptop with a touchscreen, ideal for students and cloud-based usage.
specification_1: Runs on Chrome OS, ensuring very fast boot times and continuous security updates, ideal for full reliance on cloud services.
specification_2: Touchscreen folds 360 degrees, allowing use as a tablet or in tent mode, perfect for educational apps and light gaming.
specification_3: Supports running Android apps from the Google Play Store, expanding device capabilities to include many phone applications.
spec_title_4: Long Battery Life for Cloud Use
specification_4: Battery designed to provide up to 13 hours of continuous use, vital for students who need a device that lasts all day.

name: Lenovo Yoga 9i (Gen 9)
description: A premium 2-in-1 convertible laptop known for its sophisticated design, rotating soundbar hinge, and brilliant OLED display, perfect for multimedia and creative professionals.
specification_1: Features a unique 360-degree rotating soundbar hinge with Bowers & Wilkins speakers, delivering consistent and high-quality audio in all modes (laptop, tablet, tent).
specification_2: A high-resolution OLED touch screen providing perfect blacks, cinematic color coverage, and VESA DisplayHDR True Black 500 certification.
specification_3: Crafted from aerospace-grade aluminum with polished edges and a thin profile, weighing under 1.4 kg, emphasizing portability and luxury.
specification_4: Comes with an integrated, rechargeable Active Pen stored directly within the chassis, ideal for drawing, taking notes, and quick annotations.

name: Lenovo Legion Pro 5i (Gen 9)
description: A high-performance gaming laptop with a powerful Intel Core processor and an advanced NVIDIA RTX GPU, built for competitive and demanding gaming sessions.
specification_1: Equipped with an Intel Core i9 HX processor and an NVIDIA RTX 4070, providing desktop-grade power for high-FPS gaming and heavy multitasking.
specification_2: A 16-inch QHD+ (2560x1600) display with a 240Hz refresh rate and 3ms response time, crucial for fluid and responsive competitive gameplay.
specification_3: Features Legion's ColdFront Hyper thermal technology, using a robust cooling system with dual fans and advanced heat pipes to prevent thermal throttling.
specification_4: Full-size keyboard with customizable RGB backlighting (4-zone or per-key) and 100% anti-ghosting, optimized for precise gaming inputs.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 5 (16-inch)
description: A balanced and efficient laptop with a large 16-inch screen, providing a great mix of everyday performance, sleek design, and affordability for students and daily users.
specification_1: 16-inch display with a 16:10 aspect ratio, offering expansive screen real estate for comfortable document work, web browsing, and multi-window productivity.
specification_2: Powered by the AMD Ryzen 7 series, providing excellent multi-core performance and long battery life for handling daily workloads and light creative tasks.
specification_3: Features a thin profile and a durable aluminum top cover, giving it a premium look and feel while remaining easily portable for use outside the home.
specification_4: Includes an FHD (1080p) webcam for clear video calls, equipped with a physical privacy shutter to ensure user confidentiality when not in use.

name: Lenovo ThinkBook 14 Gen 6
description: A business-focused laptop designed for small and medium-sized businesses, offering essential security, solid performance, and professional aesthetics.
specification_1: Features a stylish, dual-tone aluminum chassis and thin bezels, giving a modern look that stands out in a business environment.
specification_2: Equipped with a fingerprint reader integrated into the power button and a physical camera shutter (ThinkShutter), providing fast and secure login.
specification_3: Includes AI-based noise cancellation and a Full HD webcam, ensuring professional and clear video calls, even in noisy office environments.
specification_4: Built to meet MIL-STD-810H durability standards, ensuring reliability, and designed for easy access for RAM and storage upgrades.

name: Lenovo ThinkPad P1 Gen 7
description: A thin and powerful mobile workstation, blending the portability of the X1 Carbon with the performance required for engineers and serious creative professionals.
specification_1: Combines a thin, carbon-fiber chassis with extreme power, featuring high-end Intel Core Ultra processors and NVIDIA RTX professional graphics.
specification_2: Offers a factory color-calibrated display (Calman Certified) with high brightness and resolution, essential for accurate video and photo editing.
specification_3: Maintains the legendary ThinkPad durability and includes advanced security like a dTPM 2.0 chip and vPro manageability.
specification_4: Utilizes an advanced vapor chamber cooling system to efficiently manage the heat generated by the high-performance components in a slim chassis.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad Flex 5 (14-inch)
description: A flexible 2-in-1 Chromebook running ChromeOS, offering a quick, secure, and touch-enabled experience for productivity and entertainment on a budget.
specification_1: Runs on ChromeOS, offering instant boot-up times, automatic updates, and a low-maintenance, secure computing environment, ideal for web-centric tasks.
specification_2: Features a 360-degree hinge and a 14-inch touchscreen, allowing seamless transition between laptop, tablet, and tent modes for viewing and interaction.
specification_3: Compatible with USI (Universal Stylus Initiative) pens, enhancing the creative and note-taking capabilities in tablet mode.
specification_4: Designed for all-day use with extended battery life and a light chassis, making it a great companion for school or commuting.
